tool_description: Creates optimized transfer schedules considering warehouse capacity, carrier availability, and operational constraints to coordinate multiple inventory movements.

transfer_requests.description: List of transfer request identifiers to schedule

schedule_start_date.description: Earliest date to begin transfers (ISO 8601 format)

schedule_end_date.description: Latest date to complete all transfers (ISO 8601 format)

priority_weighting.description: Scheduling priority: urgent_first, cost_optimized, or balanced

warehouse_operating_hours.description: Daily operating hours in HH:MM-HH:MM format

exclude_weekends.description: Whether to exclude Saturday and Sunday from scheduling

error_messages: Invalid date range: schedule_end_date must be after schedule_start_date.
Transfer requests not found: Some transfer_requests identifiers are invalid.
Invalid priority weighting: Must be 'urgent_first', 'cost_optimized', or 'balanced'.
Concurrent limit exceeded: max_concurrent_transfers exceeds location capacity.
Invalid operating hours: warehouse_operating_hours must be in HH:MM-HH:MM format.
Scheduling conflict: Cannot fit all transfers within the specified timeframe.
Resource constraint: Insufficient carrier or warehouse capacity for the schedule.
usage: Provide transfer_requests array and date range for scheduling. Use priority_weighting to align with business objectives, set max_concurrent_transfers based on operational capacity, and configure warehouse_operating_hours and exclude_weekends per facility policies.

scheduled_transfers.description: Transfer schedules with dates and times

unscheduled_transfers.description: Transfers that could not be scheduled within constraints

total_schedule_duration_days.description: Total days required to complete all scheduled transfers
